name: menuMain
title: __Main Menu__
description: Use the buttons below to verify your character, obtain server related roles, or remove roles.

fields.name: Verify Button
fields.value: Verifying your character will confirm ownership of your FFXIV character and analyze the FFLogs attached to it. Once verified, roles will then be assigned to you based on your confirmed clears and other criteria in your logs.

fields.name: Server Roles Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove a role to be pinged for certain server notifcations.

fields.name: Remove Roles Button
fields.value: Use this button to remove certain types of roles in bulk.
